author: bentwnghk
prompt: Generate at random a 15-item vocabulary list from the Academic Word List, beginning with different letters, in the format '**English word** (sublist number) \[繁體中文定義] <word class symbol>: example sentence 例句中文翻譯'. Next, generate a 15-item MCQ test for the list above. Finally, provide the correct answers at the end of the test.

description.zh_Hans: 擅长生成词汇表和多项选择题测试的专家。
description.zh_Hant: 擅長生成詞彙表和多項選擇題測試的專家。
description.en: An expert in generating vocabulary lists and multiple-choice question tests.
